string-array.name: achievements_array
string-array.item: 1,Breaking Friendships,Win a game against your friend,cyan_circle
3,Smarter than you look,Win a game against the AI,gray_circle
4,Not a noob anymore,Obtain a player score of 50 points,green_circle
5,Get a life,Obtain a player score of 1000 points,rainbow_circle
